description: This file defines React functional components for UI controls in a product catalog viewer, including search input, checkbox list, range slider, and pagination components.

methods.name: SearchInput
methods.description: Accessible search input component with placeholder and change handler.

methods.name: CheckboxList
methods.description: Component rendering a list of checkboxes with toggle functionality.

methods.name: Range
methods.description: Component for selecting a numeric range with min and max inputs.

methods.name: Pagination
methods.description: Component rendering pagination controls with navigation buttons.
